author: Reuters Editorial
title: REFILE-BRIEF-Shanghai New Huang Pu Real Estate's 2017 Net Profit Up 530.9 Pct Y/Y At 645.0 Mln Yuan
text:
(Refiles to add bullet point, link)
April 25 (Reuters) - Shanghai New Huang Pu Real Estate Co Ltd:
* SAYS 2017 NET PROFIT UP 530.9 PERCENT Y/Y AT 645.0 MILLION YUAN ($102.20 million)
* SAYS Q1 NET PROFIT DOWN 6.4 PCT Y/Y AT 28.4 MLN YUAN Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2qUStXC ; bit.ly/2r3gz1N Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3112 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
